title: S1 Ep68: Do marketers matter for entrepreneurs?
itunes:title: Do marketers matter for entrepreneurs?
description: Entrepreneurs in developing countries need access to finance, education, and better institutions. But do they need more marketing? Stephen J Anderson of the University of Texas tells Tim Phillips about an experiment in Uganda that suggests that the answer is yes for both the entrepreneurs, and for economic growth.
itunes:author: VoxDev.org
dc:creator: VoxDev.org
